location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Andrew Ramsay, Robert Sparks, David Carnegie, at Bombay Castle (Public Department), to Charles Watkins, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses briefly the procurement of plants for the botanical garden at Bengal, the recent conduct of Sheikh Nasir [NƒÅsir], and the need for more money to pay for the running of the Bushire factory.
